A

active - Variable in class Tile
flag: is this tile active or has it been disabled?
allRounds - Static variable in class Main
 
availableTime - Static variable in class Main
 

B

blankClick(Tile) - Method in class Tile
blankClick is a method that recursively reveals adjacent tiles of a blank tile For each neighbor tile that is active, the method disables the corresponding button, removes any graphics from it, sets its text to the number of bombs around it, sets its text color to the corresponding color, and marks it as inactive.
bombPercent - Static variable in class Main
 
bombsLeft - Static variable in class Main
 
btn - Variable in class Tile
each tile is a button that can be clicked of flagged and then becomes disabled.

C

color - Variable in class Tile
In Main.java, the color of every number of bombs adjacent to a tile is defined.
count_flags - Static variable in class Tile
To constraint the number of flagged tiles.
countdownLabel - Static variable in class Main
 
createContent() - Static method in class Main
create tiles, assign bombs and super bomb if it exists

F

fifthValueGrid - Static variable in class scenarioReader
Grid dimensions, for difficulty level 1 -> 9x9, for difficulty level 2 -> 16x16.
firstLine - Static variable in class scenarioReader
Difficulty Level, 1 for easy, 2 for hard
flag - Static variable in class Tile
Image for flagging tiles.

To check if the first four flags deployed on tiles, flagged the super bomb.
foundBombs - Static variable in class Main
 
fourthLine - Static variable in class scenarioReader
Super bomb, 0 for super bomb exclusion, 1 for super bomb inclusion

U
